quote: A sob caught in my chest. I didn't even know what a gray was, other than a drab color. All I knew was that I was hungry all the time. And I knew, deep down, that it wasn't just for food.
quote_letters: A SOB CAUGHT IN MY CHEST I DIDNT EVEN KNOW WHAT A GRAY WAS OTHER THAN A DRAB COLOR ALL I KNEW WAS THAT I WAS HUNGRY ALL THE TIME AND I KNEW DEEP DOWN THAT IT WASNT JUST FOR FOOD
